data.description: What an incredible opportunity to own a piece of the action! this property is classified as a MU-2 (Mixed use 2) zoning for a variety mixed commercial and residential uses. Immediately across the street a large national builder is developing DOZENS of town homes visible from the street. An owner can potentially develop these lots also for townhomes/apartments (20-30), convenience store, Medical office or any other city approved business that would benefit by near infrastructure. The new Atrium Hospital is a stone's throw away as well as the intersection of a major interstate and I-485 with union county school system and lower Union county taxes. This 2008 Stallings rd is being sold TOGETHER with parcel immediately adjacent to it (2008 Stallings rd, Parcel ID:07-102-037 Legal description: 7035-553) The two parcels total roughly 2.6 acres per tax records for 1.3 M Commercial MLS# 4014450  Uses Chart link: https://www.stallingsnc.org/LinkClick.aspx?fileticket=vxHyuwPr9zw%3D&portalid=0
